com.team09.qanda.models

Class ThreadList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team09.qanda.models.QModel<QView>
      • com.team09.qanda.models.ThreadList

  • public class ThreadList
extends QModel<QView>
    This class represents a list of QuestionThreads, which is used to display the list of questions on the main screen, as well as the questions stored locally.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThreadList()
      The default constructor sets up the variables needed by the class.
      ThreadList(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sortType)
      This constructor takes an optional parameter to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object.
      ThreadList(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sortType, int numThreads)
      This constructor takes optional parameters to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object, as well as to set the number of threads it should request from the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuestionThread get(int i)
      Gets a single QuestionThread at the specified location from the object
      int getNumThreads()
      Returns the current number of threads being requested from the server.
      java.util.ArrayList<Post> getQuestions()
      A convenience function to return the questions from all of the threads in the object
      io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort getSortType()
      Returns the current sorting style of the object
      java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> getThreads()
      Gets the list of threads stored in the object.

      Sets the number of threads to be requested from the server.
      void setSortType(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sort)
      This sets the type of sorting to be done.
      void setThreads(java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> threads)
      This sets the current list of QuestionThreads in the object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadList

        public ThreadList()
        The default constructor sets up the variables needed by the class. It creates a default Gson, sets the number of threads to 10, sets the sort to most upvoted, and makes an empty list for the QuestionThreads.

      • ThreadList

        public ThreadList(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sortType)
        This constructor takes an optional parameter to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object.
        Parameters:
        sortType - The style of sorting to be used.

      • ThreadList

        public ThreadList(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sortType,
                  int numThreads)
        This constructor takes optional parameters to set the type of sorting when instantiating the object, as well as to set the number of threads it should request from the server.
        Parameters:
        sortType - The style of sorting to be used.
        numThreads - The number of threads to be requested from the server.

    • Method Detail

      • setSortType

        public void setSortType(io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort sort)
        This sets the type of sorting to be done. This affects the query to the server.
        Parameters:
        sort - The style of sorting to be used.

      • getSortType

        public io.searchbox.core.search.sort.Sort getSortType()
        Returns the current sorting style of the object
        Returns:
        The style of sorting being used.

      • getNumThreads

        public int getNumThreads()
        Returns the current number of threads being requested from the server.
        Returns:
        The number of threads being requested as an integer

      • setNumThreads

        public void setNumThreads(int num)
        Sets the number of threads to be requested from the server.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of threads to be requested as an integer.

      • getThreads

        public java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> getThreads()
        Gets the list of threads stored in the object.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all of the QuestionThreads from the object

      • getQuestions

        public java.util.ArrayList<Post> getQuestions()
        A convenience function to return the questions from all of the threads in the object
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing the questions of all of the threads.

      • setThreads

        public void setThreads(java.util.ArrayList<QuestionThread> threads)
        This sets the current list of QuestionThreads in the object. It can be used to add or remove a question
        Parameters:
        threads - The new list of QuestionThreads

      • get

        public QuestionThread get(int i)
        Gets a single QuestionThread at the specified location from the object
        Parameters:
        i - The location of the object to be returned
        Returns:
        A QuestionThread from the postion in the list.
